请设置僵尸在开局45秒后尸变.translation: Please set infection countdown 45 seconds after round start

所有人类有20%概率获得神圣屏障.translation: All humans have a 20% chance to obtain a sacred barrier

(在即将触发机关时消耗并传送至安全区域).translation: (Consumed and transported to a safe area before triggering a mechanism)

进入大门，跟随眼睛的指引找到古代传送门.translation: Enter the gate and follow the eyes' guidance to find the ancient portal

...死亡会降临到那些看不到圣甲虫的人身上.translation: ...Death will come to those who cannot see the scarab

所有人类有50%概率获得发光沙漏.translation: All humans have a 50% chance to obtain a glowing hourglass

(在即将触发机关时消耗并传送至外场).translation: (Consumed and transported to an outer area before triggering a mechanism)

所有人类有20%概率获得终末天启.translation: All humans have a 20% chance to obtain the apocalypse

(触碰圣甲虫时不触发机关).translation: (Touching the scarab does not trigger the mechanism)
